metadata.title: Wetlands of international importance under the Ramsar convention
metadata.lineage:
The GIS boundary data have been collated at JNCC from data supplied by the following organisations:
        -Scottish Natural Heritage: www.snh.gov.uk
        -Natural Resources Wales: www.ccw.gov.uk
        -Natural England: www.naturalengland.org.uk
        -Northern Ireland Environment Agency: www.ni-environment.gov.uk

The shapefile name is UK_RAMSAR_20150903_OSGB1936.shp, and it contains RAMSAR sites for GB and NI.
metadata.abstract: A spatial dataset of Ramsar sites in the United Kingdom (i.e. Great Britain and Northern Ireland). Note that this does not include sites in the UK's Overseas Territories and Crown Dependencies. Ramsar sites are wetlands of international importance designated under the Ramsar Convention. Ramsar sites are submitted to the Ramsar Secretariat by JNCC on behalf of the UK Government.
metadata.useConstraints: Released under the Open Government Licence v3.0. Attribution statement: “Contains public sector data from © JNCC/NE/NRW/SNH/DOENI 2016. Contains OS data © Crown Copyright and database right 2016.” This dataset is registered with OS under the presumption to publish notification arrangement to enable free onward use under the terms of the Open Government Licence v3.0.
